  Update Notes:
  =============

  Changes made to the game code to address various crash issues:

  - A number of crash fixes
  - Adjustments to vsync options (if previously using,  
    this will now be disabled by default). 
  - Fix for Delirium pets sometimes preventing game 
    progression in some areas. (Shax Door)



  Instructions:
  =============

  * Requirements: Lichdom_Battlemage_Update_v2014.08.27.65558_Hotfix-FLTDOX
  * Unpack the update and run flt-libahf2.exe
  * Select the folder of your installation and click 'install'
  * Wait for the patching to finish
  * Play the game

                                                            /TEAM FAIRLIGHT
